comments.content: One of the aces around here will probably identify this for you. In case they don't, though, I'll mention that Derek Vogelpohl's [SF Comic Script Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224728/http:/www.dafont.com/sf-comic-script.font?fpp=100&text=MUSTANG+SALLYZ) is quite close.

Thought it might be by Blambot or Comicraft, but so far just found some similars: Slaphappy [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/slaphappy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224728/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/slaphappy/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/slaphappy/") and Bronto Burger [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/bronto-burger/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224728/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/bronto-burger/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/bronto-burger/") DangerGirl [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/danger-girl/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224728/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/danger-girl/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/danger-girl/")  
Don

Another similar, Bangers [https://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Bangers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224728/https:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Bangers "https://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Bangers")  
Also Badaboom BB [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/bada-boom-pro-bb/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224728/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/bada-boom-pro-bb/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/bada-boom-pro-bb/") and the earlier version [http://www.dafont.com/badaboom-bb.font?text=MUSTANGSALLYZSALOON](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224728/http:/www.dafont.com/badaboom-bb.font?text=MUSTANGSALLYZSALOON "http://www.dafont.com/badaboom-bb.font?text=MUSTANGSALLYZSALOON")  
Don
